column4: haha, I once tried to install gentoo phase1 on an SGI O2 haha. I stopped it after 3days =p
haha, you geeks crack me up today...
you may want to make sure your bashrc doesn't have history=0
is there an easy way to manage it?
iptables does not explicitly state blocking icmp
route -n = 2 entries Dest = <the correct network (192.168.0.0)>, Gateway = 0.0.0.0
not all that easy, no GUI
ah but wait, I think I can
the top one is route -n the bottom is netstat r
here is my test box /etc/network/interfaces iface eth0 inet dhcp
